summary: We testified about Navy efforts to improve its 4 public shipyards. The condition of these facilities has a direct impact on the readiness of the aircraft carrier and submarine fleets they maintain. The Navy began a 20-year, $21 billion effort to modernize them in 2018 Average facility condition has improved at 3 of the 4 since 2017 Detailed investment plans for each shipyard won't be...
title: Naval Shipyards: Ongoing Challenges Could Jeopardize Navy's Ability to Improve Shipyards
